kw.name: Open browser and navigate to Coinswitch URL
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: TC_1: Verify the "Buy Bitcoin" option in the home page

kw.name: Given "Buy Bitcoin" The User is on the homepage
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${Homepage} = Secure and Efficient Crypto Trading: Buy and Sell Crypto on Multiple Exchanges

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: When The User clicks on the "Buy Bitcoin" option
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath = (//*[@class='group-h tw-flex tw-w-full tw-justify-end tw-gap-4 tw-text-lg tw-text-white']/li/span/a)[1]'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then The User should be redirected to the Buy Bitcoin page
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${BitcoinTitle} = BTC to INR | Buy BTC in India at best price at | CoinSwitch

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: TC_2: Verify the "Buy Ethereum" option in the home page

kw.name: Given "Buy Ethereum" The User is on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When The User clicks on the "Buy Ethereum" option
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath = (//*[@class='group-h tw-flex tw-w-full tw-justify-end tw-gap-4 tw-text-lg tw-text-white']/li/span/a)[2]'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then The User should be redirected to the Buy Ethereum page
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${EthereumTitle} = ETH to INR | Buy ETH in India at best price at â‚¹1,34,970 | CoinSwitch

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: TC_4: Verify the "Crypto Rupee Index" option of the "Products" dropdown in the home page

kw.name: Given "Crypto Rupee Index" The User is on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: When The User user mouse over the "Products" dropdown
Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'xpath = (//*[@class='tw-text-gray-200 group-hover:tw-text-gold'])[1]'.

kw.name: And The User clicks on the "Crypto Rupee Index" option
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then The User should be redirected to the Crypto Rupee Index page
Get Window Handles
kw.doc: Returns all child window handles of the selected browser as a list.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${CRItitle} = CRE8: Indian Crypto Index by CoinSwitch

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Close Window
kw.doc: Closes currently opened and selected browser window/tab.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

test.name: TC_12: Verify the "Multiple Exchanges, One Platform" section in the home page

kw.name: Given "Multiple Exchanges, One Platform" The User is on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: When The User scrolls down to the "Multiple Exchanges, One Platform" section
Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath = (//*[@class='tw-max-w-sm tw-py-4 tw-text-3xl tw-text-gold-500 md:tw-max-w-xs md:tw-text-4xl'])[1]' contains exact text 'Multiple Exchanges, One Platform'.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Multiple Exchanges, One Platform section has been displayed
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And The User clicks on the "Try Now" option of "Multiple Exchanges, One Platform" section
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then The User should be redirected to the Multiple Exchanges, One Platform page
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${MXOPTitle} = BTC to INR | Buy BTC in India at best price at â‚¹24,69,761 | CoinSwitch

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: TC_15: Verify the "Rate" icon in the home page

kw.name: Given "Rate" The User is on the homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: When The User clicks on the "Rate" Icon
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And The User clicks on the "Like" option
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And The User enters text data on the "Tell Us Your Experience" textfield
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And The User clicks on send button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And The User clicks on skip button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then The User should be able to see 'Thanks for Sharing Your Feedback with Us' message
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${ThanksText} = Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath = //*[@class='_hj-PFeiP__MinimizedWidgetMessage__messageText']' contains exact text 'Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!'.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: "Thank you for sharing your feedback with us!" message has been displayed
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Close Window
kw.doc: Closes currently opened and selected browser window/tab.
